name: TokyWoky Dark Theme
description: Just a simple dark theme for TokyWoky, so that users won't burn their eyes more on the white website.
additional_info:
ChannelLog :

----------14/11/2017----------
v0.2 beta
- Turned ShellChatBox to dark
- Fixed New Incoming message staying white after display

V0.1 beta
- First release, still in developpement.

Please comment for any bugs or suggestions ! Thanks in advance !
